00096 void Micropolis::drawMonth(short *hist, unsigned char *s, float scale)
00097 {
00098     int val, x;
00099 
00100     for (x = 0; x < 120; x++) {
00101         val = (int)(hist[x] * scale);
00102         s[119 - x] = (unsigned char)clamp(val, 0, 255);
00103     }
00104 }

00111 void Micropolis::changeCensus()
00112 {
00113     censusChanged = true;
00114 }

00116 
00121 void Micropolis::graphDoer()
00122 {
00123     if (censusChanged) {
00124         callback("update", "s", "history");
00125         censusChanged = false;
00126     }
00127 }

00131 void Micropolis::initGraphs()
00132 {
00133     if (!historyInitialized) {
00134         historyInitialized = true;
00135     }
00136 }

00140 void Micropolis::initGraphMax()
00141 {
00142     int x;
00143 
00144     resHist10Max = 0;
00145     comHist10Max = 0;
00146     indHist10Max = 0;
00147 
00148     for (x = 118; x >= 0; x--) {
00149 
00150         if (resHist[x] < 0) {
00151             resHist[x] = 0;
00152         }
00153         if (comHist[x] < 0) {
00154             comHist[x] = 0;
00155         }
00156         if (indHist[x] < 0) {
00157             indHist[x] = 0;
00158         }
00159 
00160         resHist10Max = max(resHist10Max, resHist[x]);
00161         comHist10Max = max(comHist10Max, comHist[x]);
00162         indHist10Max = max(indHist10Max, indHist[x]);
00163 
00164     }
00165 
00166     graph10Max =
00167         max(resHist10Max,
00168             max(comHist10Max,
00169                 indHist10Max));
00170 
00171     resHist120Max = 0;
00172     comHist120Max = 0;
00173     indHist120Max = 0;
00174 
00175     for (x = 238; x >= 120; x--) {
00176 
00177         if (resHist[x] < 0) {
00178             resHist[x] = 0;
00179         }
00180         if (comHist[x] < 0) {
00181             comHist[x] = 0;
00182         }
00183         if (indHist[x] < 0) {
00184             indHist[x] = 0;
00185         }
00186 
00187         resHist120Max = max(resHist120Max, resHist[x]);
00188         comHist120Max = max(comHist120Max, comHist[x]);
00189         indHist120Max = max(indHist120Max, indHist[x]);
00190 
00191     }
00192 
00193     graph120Max =
00194         max(resHist120Max,
00195             max(comHist120Max,
00196                 indHist120Max));
00197 }

00207 void Micropolis::getHistoryRange(int historyType, int historyScale,
00208                                  short *minValResult, short *maxValResult)
00209 {
00210     if (historyType < 0 || historyType >= HISTORY_TYPE_COUNT
00211             || historyScale < 0 || historyScale >= HISTORY_SCALE_COUNT) {
00212         *minValResult = 0;
00213         *maxValResult = 0;
00214         return;
00215     }
00216 
00217     short *history = NULL;
00218     switch (historyType) {
00219         case HISTORY_TYPE_RES:
00220             history = resHist;
00221             break;
00222         case HISTORY_TYPE_COM:
00223             history = comHist;
00224             break;
00225         case HISTORY_TYPE_IND:
00226             history = indHist;
00227             break;
00228         case HISTORY_TYPE_MONEY:
00229             history = moneyHist;
00230             break;
00231         case HISTORY_TYPE_CRIME:
00232             history = crimeHist;
00233             break;
00234         case HISTORY_TYPE_POLLUTION:
00235             history = pollutionHist;
00236             break;
00237         default:
00238             NOT_REACHED();
00239             break;
00240     }
00241 
00242     int offset = 0;
00243     switch (historyScale) {
00244         case HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00245             offset = 0;
00246             break;
00247         case HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00248             offset = 120;
00249             break;
00250         default:
00251             NOT_REACHED();
00252             break;
00253     }
00254 
00255     short minVal = 32000;
00256     short maxVal = -32000;
00257 
00258     for (int i = 0; i < HISTORY_COUNT; i++) {
00259         short val = history[i + offset];
00260 
00261         minVal = min(val, minVal);
00262         maxVal = max(val, maxVal);
00263     }
00264 
00265     *minValResult = minVal;
00266     *maxValResult = maxVal;
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00277 short Micropolis::getHistory(int historyType, int historyScale,
00278                              int historyIndex)
00279 {
00280     if (historyType < 0 || historyType >= HISTORY_TYPE_COUNT
00281             || historyScale < 0 || historyScale >= HISTORY_SCALE_COUNT
00282             || historyIndex < 0 || historyIndex >= HISTORY_COUNT) {
00283         return 0;
00284     }
00285 
00286     short *history = NULL;
00287     switch (historyType) {
00288         case HISTORY_TYPE_RES:
00289             history = resHist;
00290             break;
00291         case HISTORY_TYPE_COM:
00292             history = comHist;
00293             break;
00294         case HISTORY_TYPE_IND:
00295             history = indHist;
00296             break;
00297         case HISTORY_TYPE_MONEY:
00298             history = moneyHist;
00299             break;
00300         case HISTORY_TYPE_CRIME:
00301             history = crimeHist;
00302             break;
00303         case HISTORY_TYPE_POLLUTION:
00304             history = pollutionHist;
00305             break;
00306         default:
00307             NOT_REACHED();
00308             break;
00309     }
00310 
00311     int offset = 0;
00312     switch (historyScale) {
00313         case HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00314             offset = 0;
00315             break;
00316         case HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00317             offset = 120;
00318             break;
00319         default:
00320             NOT_REACHED();
00321             break;
00322     }
00323 
00324     short result = history[historyIndex + offset];
00325 
00326     return result;
00327 }

00337 void Micropolis::setHistory(int historyType, int historyScale,
00338                             int historyIndex, short historyValue)
00339 {
00340     if (historyType < 0 || historyType >= HISTORY_TYPE_COUNT
00341             || historyScale < 0 || historyScale >= HISTORY_SCALE_COUNT
00342             || historyIndex < 0 || historyIndex >= HISTORY_COUNT) {
00343         return;
00344     }
00345 
00346     short *history = NULL;
00347     switch (historyType) {
00348         case HISTORY_TYPE_RES:
00349             history = resHist;
00350             break;
00351         case HISTORY_TYPE_COM:
00352             history = comHist;
00353             break;
00354         case HISTORY_TYPE_IND:
00355             history = indHist;
00356             break;
00357         case HISTORY_TYPE_MONEY:
00358             history = moneyHist;
00359             break;
00360         case HISTORY_TYPE_CRIME:
00361             history = crimeHist;
00362             break;
00363         case HISTORY_TYPE_POLLUTION:
00364             history = pollutionHist;
00365             break;
00366         default:
00367             NOT_REACHED();
00368             break;
00369     }
00370 
00371     int offset = 0;
00372     switch (historyScale) {
00373         case HISTORY_SCALE_SHORT:
00374             offset = 0;
00375             break;
00376         case HISTORY_SCALE_LONG:
00377             offset = 120;
00378             break;
00379         default:
00380             NOT_REACHED();
00381             break;
00382     }
00383 
00384     history[historyIndex + offset] = historyValue;
00385 }
